resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158681</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158681</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2735</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Synaptic transmission</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Synaptische Übertragung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transmission synaptique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transmissão synaptic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasmissione sinaptica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συναπτική μετάδοση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transmisión sináptica</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Demonstrates the main ionic and molecular processes involved in tranmission of an impulse over a synapse.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">brain,synapses</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Demonstriert die Hauptionen- und molekularen 
Prozesse, die in tranmission eines Antriebs über einer Synapse mit 
einbezogen werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Démontre les processus ioniques et moléculaires 
principaux impliqués dans le tranmission d'une impulsion au-dessus 
d'une synapse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Demonstra os processos ionic e molecular 
principais envolvidos no tranmission de um impulso sobre uma sinapse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dimostra i processi ionici e molecolari principali
addetti a tranmission di un impulso sopra una sinapsi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καταδεικνύει τις βασικές ιοντικές και μοριακές 
διαδικασίες που περιλαμβάνονται στο tranmission μιας ώθησης 
πέρα από μια σύναψη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Demuestra los procesos iónicos y moleculares 
principales implicados en el tranmission de un impulso sobre una 
sinapsis.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gehirn, Synapsen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cerveau, synapses</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cérebro, sinapses</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cervello, sinapsi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εγκέφαλος, συνάψεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cerebro, sinapsis</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>
            <source>statusValues</source>
            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
version:3.0
fn:Israel Ministry of Education
n:Israel Ministry of Education
org:Israel Ministry of Education
end:vcard</entity>
            <date>
              <dateTime>2009-02-20</dateTime>
            </date>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>

            <entry>ILMoE2735</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
version:3.0
fn:Israel Ministry of Education
n:Israel Ministry of Education
org:Israel Ministry of Education
end:vcard</entity>
            <date>
              <dateTime>2009-02-20</dateTime>
            </date>
          </contribute>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>web page</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="en">14-18</string>
            <string language="x-t-lre">14-18</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">EduMedia terms of use at link http://www.edumedia-sciences.com/en/c9-general-terms-of-use</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>143</id>
              <entry>
                <string language="en">Biological sciences</string>
              </entry>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>158681</entry>
